mapper.select: SELECT ts, type, amount, total, customers FROM order_stats_history WHERE type = 'ALL' ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT ts, type, amount, total, customers FROM order_stats_history WHERE type != 'ALL' AND ts = (SELECT MAX(ts) FROM order_stats_history WHERE type != 'ALL') ORDER BY amount DESC;
